PSCT.Base: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can make this card Level 4, then you can add 1 "Spirit Converter" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can target 1 other card you control; send both it and this card to the GY, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Electrode Beast Anion" once per turn.
